com.iplanet.services.naming

Class WebtopNaming.SiteMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.common.GeneralTaskRunnable
      • com.iplanet.services.naming.WebtopNaming.SiteMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskRunnable, Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    WebtopNaming

    public static class WebtopNaming.SiteMonitor
extends GeneralTaskRunnable
    The SiteMonitor class is used to monitor the health status of all the sites.
